attributes.action: require all members of the House of Lords who were appointed to the House to enable them to take up a Government post to resign their seat when they stand down from their position.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has become common practice to appoint unelected men and women to posts within Government and to give them a seat in the House of Lords at the same time.

Many of these people only serve a sort term in office before resigning but when they do so they are able to retain their seat in the House of Lords thus keeping all the perks and privileges associated with  a seat in the Lords.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
